entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Bernières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sainte-Foy - Laval University 12:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain in the morning then to rain late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Snow over northern sections late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
